snippet: Paul Pierce had 18 points and 11 rebounds, and Avery Bradley scored 22 points to lead the visiting Boston Celtics to a 109-101 win over the Philadelphia 76ers.
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce had 18 points and 11 rebounds, and Avery Bradley scored 22 points to lead the visiting Boston Celtics to a 109-101 win over the Philadelphia 76ers.

headline.seo: Celtics Win and Continue to Climb
headline.main: Celtics Win and Continue to Climb
headline.print_headline: Celtics Win and Continue to Climb
